Container.Name: OpenClaw
Container.Overview: OpenClaw (formerly ClawdBot/MoltBot) is a powerful AI assistant gateway that connects Claude and other LLMs to messaging platforms like Discord, Telegram, WhatsApp, and more. Features include file access, shell commands, web browsing, cron jobs, and a web-based Control UI. Now with Ollama support for local LLMs! IMPORTANT: To access the Control UI, add your token to the URL: http://YOUR-IP:18789/?token=YOUR-GATEWAY-TOKEN OLLAMA SETUP: Set Ollama Base URL to http://172.17.0.1:11434/v1 (or your Unraid IP) and Ollama API Key to any value like 'ollama-local' to enable local models.
Container.PostArgs: sh -c "wget -qO /tmp/startup.js https://raw.githubusercontent.com/l984-451/openclaw-unraid-ollama/main/startup-config.js || curl -sL -o /tmp/startup.js https://raw.githubusercontent.com/l984-451/openclaw-unraid-ollama/main/startup-config.js; node /tmp/startup.js; node dist/index.js gateway --bind lan"

Config.Name: Control UI Port
Config.Description: Port for Control UI and Gateway API

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Path to store OpenClaw configuration files

Config.Name: Workspace Path
Config.Description: Path for agent workspace (files, memory, projects)

Config.Name: Projects Path
Config.Description: Optional path for coding projects

Config.Name: Homebrew Path
Config.Description: Persistent Homebrew packages for skills requiring Go, npm, etc. Auto-installs on first start (~60 sec).

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Secret token for authentication. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 24. To access Control UI: http://IP:18789/?token=YOUR_TOKEN

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: API key for Claude models. Get from console.anthropic.com. Recommended for best experience.

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: API key for GPT models. Get from platform.openai.com

Config.Name: OpenRouter API Key
Config.Description: API key for OpenRouter - access to Claude, GPT, Llama, and 100+ models. Get from openrouter.ai

Config.Name: Gemini API Key
Config.Description: API key for Google Gemini models. Get from aistudio.google.com

Config.Name: Groq API Key
Config.Description: API key for Groq (fast Llama/Mixtral inference). Get from console.groq.com

Config.Name: Ollama Base URL
Config.Description: Ollama server URL WITH /v1 suffix. For Ollama on same Unraid: http://172.17.0.1:11434/v1 or http://YOUR_UNRAID_IP:11434/v1. Leave empty to disable Ollama.

Config.Name: Ollama API Key
Config.Description: Set to any value (e.g., 'ollama-local') to enable Ollama. Leave empty to disable.

Config.Name: Ollama Model
Config.Description: Default Ollama model (e.g., qwen2.5-coder:32b, llama3.3, deepseek-r1:32b). Must be pulled in Ollama first. Leave empty to choose in Control UI.

Config.Name: Ollama Context Window
Config.Description: Context window size for Ollama models. Recommended: 16384-65536 depending on your VRAM.

Config.Name: Discord Bot Token
Config.Description: (Optional) Discord bot token. Can also configure via Control UI.

Config.Name: Telegram Bot Token
Config.Description: (Optional) Telegram bot token from @BotFather. Can also configure via Control UI.

Config.Name: Gateway Port
Config.Description: Port for gateway API and Control UI.

Config.Name: Web Search API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Brave Search API key for web search. Free tier: 2000 queries/month at brave.com/search/api

Config.Name: Startup Script URL
Config.Description: (Advanced) Custom URL for startup script. Leave empty to use default from GitHub.
